restaurants.name: Rico's Lechon
restaurants.description: If you're a fan of roasted pig, you wouldn't want to miss trying out Rico's Lechon! This popular restaurant is known for their deliciously roasted pigs, also known as lechon in Filipino, which are tender, juicy, and crispy all at the same time. At Rico's Lechon, they roast their pigs over charcoal for several hours until they are cooked to perfection. The skin is crispy and golden brown, while the meat inside is juicy and flavorful, infused with herbs and spices. Aside from their signature lechon, Rico's Lechon also offers other Filipino dishes, such as sinigang, adobo, and crispy pata, which are all worth trying out. You can enjoy your meal with a cold beer or any other refreshing beverage. So if you want to experience the ultimate Filipino dining experience, make sure to add Rico's Lechon to your food itinerary.

restaurants.name: Lantaw Native Restaurant
restaurants.description: Lantaw Native Restaurant serves a wide array of Filipino dishes with a modern twist, prepared using only the freshest and finest ingredients. From classic favorites like grilled pork belly, shrimp in garlic, and crispy pata to innovative dishes like sinigang na tangigue sa calamansi and sizzling spicy squid, the restaurant's menu is a true feast for the senses. One of the highlights of dining at Lantaw Native Restaurant is its breathtaking view of the sea, which you can enjoy while savoring your meal. The restaurant is situated on a hillside overlooking the Mactan Channel, providing a panoramic view of the surrounding waters and nearby islands. It's a perfect spot to catch the sunset and relax with friends and family.

restaurants.name: The Pyramid
restaurants.description: The Pyramid restaurant in Cebu is a must-visit for anyone who loves great food and stunning views. Located at the top of the Pyramid building, this restaurant offers panoramic views of the city, which makes for a truly unforgettable dining experience. The menu features a range of delicious dishes, from traditional Filipino favorites to international cuisine, all expertly prepared by the talented chefs. Whether you're visiting Cebu for the first time or you're a seasoned traveler, the Pyramid restaurant is definitely worth checking out!

restaurants.name: Manna Sutikil
restaurants.description: Manna Sutikil is a popular restaurant in Cebu that specializes in serving up traditional Filipino cuisine. The name 'sutikil' actually refers to a specific cooking method that involves grilling, boiling, and dipping the food in vinegar and soy sauce. At Manna Sutikil, you can try a range of classic Filipino dishes like grilled seafood, lechon, and adobo, all cooked using the sutikil method. The restaurant has a casual and laid-back atmosphere, making it a great spot to grab a meal with friends or family.

restaurants.name: La Vie in the Sky
restaurants.description: La Vie in the Sky is a beautiful rooftop bar and restaurant located in Cebu, Philippines. Perched atop the Ogle Building, this venue offers stunning panoramic views of the city skyline. The bar features an extensive selection of wines and cocktails, while the restaurant serves up a range of delicious international cuisine. La Vie in the Sky is the perfect spot for a romantic night out or a fun evening with friends, and it's sure to be a highlight of any visit to Cebu.

resorts.name: Shangri-La's Mactan Resort & Spa
resorts.description: Shangri-La Hotel is a luxurious hotel chain that has a presence in many cities across the world, including Cebu in the Philippines. The hotel boasts stunning views of the Mactan Sea, which is just a stone's throw away. The rooms are spacious and elegantly designed with modern amenities to make your stay as comfortable as possible. You can choose from different room categories, from deluxe rooms to suites, depending on your preferences and needs. The hotel also features an array of facilities that cater to both leisure and business travelers. You can enjoy a dip in their outdoor swimming pool or relax in their serene spa. For those who are fitness enthusiasts, the hotel has a gym with state-of-the-art equipment. Additionally, business travelers can take advantage of their conference and meeting rooms that are equipped with the latest technology.

resorts.name: Crimson Resort & Spa Mactan
resorts.description: Crimson Resort & Spa is a luxurious beachfront hotel situated on the picturesque Mactan Island in Cebu. The resort offers guests a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of city life, with its private white sand beach and crystal-clear waters perfect for swimming and water sports. The rooms and villas are elegantly designed and offer stunning ocean views, while the resort's restaurants serve a range of international cuisine. Guests can indulge in a variety of spa treatments, relax by the pool, or take part in various outdoor activities like island hopping and snorkeling. Overall, Crimson Resort & Spa offers a perfect mix of luxury, relaxation, and adventure for a memorable stay in Cebu.

resorts.name: Plantation Bay Resort and Spa
resorts.description: Plantation Bay Hotel is a beautiful and luxurious resort located in Mactan Island, Cebu. The resort features a stunning man-made lagoon, four freshwater swimming pools, a saltwater pool, and several private beaches. The hotel offers a range of accommodations, including deluxe rooms, suites, and villas. Guests can enjoy a variety of activities, including kayaking, diving, snorkeling, and even fishing. The resort also boasts a range of dining options, from casual beachside cafes to fine dining restaurants. Plantation Bay Hotel is a perfect place to unwind and relax in the beautiful island of Cebu.
